desc: Fresh appetizers, desserts and groceries items delivered right to your door within the Greater Toronto Area. Using local organic ingredients throughout our products as much as we can. Trained Chef prepared meals using sustainable ingredients, to everyday items. Shop now and get your next meal delivered to your door!

layout.text: We offer a wide variety of popular food stations for private functions, company parties and cocktail parties. We offer anything from a breakfast omelette bar to spectacular pasta or outdoor Neapolitan pizza stations.
